content:
# The persistent issue with placing the Stone Furnace indicates that my player position has not updated correctly, remaining at (0.0, 0.0).
# This suggests that the movement commands are not functioning as intended. I will attempt a different approach to ensure I can place the furnace.

# Step 31: Move to a position that is guaranteed to be within range of the coal resource patch.
move_to(Position(x=10.0, y=-10.0))  # Move to a position that should be within range of the coal patch.
